entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Clearing this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
